TopicTitle: Why don't youtube videos go fullscreen?

Articles.Content:
I've recently noticed that youtube videos embeded in the forums do not have the ability to go fullscreen without actually going to youtube, is there a reason with for this or is it just a switch the devs could turn on at any time?

example:
I think it is a switch that could just be toggled on....

The Daily Kerbal Video Wednesday videos can go fullscreen.

At a guess, it's because bbcode disallows fullscreen, but the Daily Kerbal uses straight HTML.

I'll check to see if I can do anything on my end, because it's really annoyed me too.

EDIT: [noparse][YtPl=size%][/YtPl][/noparse] does allow fullscreen. I've send a memo to Kasper about [noparse] [/noparse].
